name: nextcloud-tasks
description: Nextcloud Tasks is a to-do and task-tracking app that syncs with CalDAV and supports subtasks, due dates, and lists. It works across devices within the Nextcloud ecosystem.

features.title: Task Management
features.description: Create, organize, and track to-do items with descriptions and notes

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize tasks across devices using standard CalDAV protocol

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set deadlines for tasks with reminders and overdue notifications

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Mark tasks with priority indicators for importance ranking

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Mark tasks as complete and track completion percentage for subtasks

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access and manage tasks from iOS and Android devices
